title: TFR Ep. 629: Black Adam, Clerks III, Wolfen, 5 Favorite View Askew Universe Characters
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt shout “Shazam!” and The Rock’s passion project ‘Black Adam’ appears in a burst of lightning, ready for our review. Is it the course correction the DCEU has been waiting for?  Then the guys make one last trip to the Quik Stop with ‘Clerks III’.  Kevin Smith revisits the much beloved convenience store in Red Bank, NJ. But can you really go home again, again? The Werewolf Marathon continues with the barely relevant, ‘Wolfen’, featuring Albert Finney facing off against urban blight, gentrification, and some really ticked off not-quite werewolves. There’s the bone-chilling breakdown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight-To-DVD picks of the week. Then Matt and Chris wrap up the show with their 5 Favorite View Askew Universe Characters. Happy Halloween and…’SHAZAM’!

00:00-21:54: Intro/Black Adam/DCEU

21:55-36:38: Clerks III

36:39-55:21: Physical Media Picks

55:22-1:06:08: Wolfen

1:06:09-1:18:23: 5 Favorite View Askew Universe Characters

1:18:24-1:19:28: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
